forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As night settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city breathes in the cool embrace of partly cloudy skies, with temperatures gently cradling the evening at around 47 degrees. The air is still, with a soft whisper of a west-southwest breeze meandering at about 3 mph, creating a serene ambiance. The charm of this neighborhood unfolds under the muted glow of streetlights reflecting off tranquil streets, setting the stage for a peaceful evening.

Tomorrow promises a delightful turn, as the sun rises with intentions of showering the city in a warm embrace. Expect mostly sunny skies gracing the day, with temperatures peaking near 63 degrees before a gentle descent into the afternoon. A light north-northwest wind will add a refreshing touch, perfect for those who enjoy the crispness of winter air mingling with the sun's soft warmth. As the marine layer lingers nearby, one may notice remnants of fog nestled along the Bay, hinting at the playful dance of weather beneath the iconic bridge. Dressing in layers will be prudent; a light jacket in the morning to combat the coolness, transitioning to lighter clothing as the sun takes charge. With these pleasant conditions, a gentle stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet visit to a local café seems fitting, allowing one to savor the serenity of this vibrant city.
